com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm

Interface LinearSVMModelTrainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClassificationModelTrainer

    public interface LinearSVMModelTrainer
extends ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains a Linear SVM machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream. Note: if the same feature is encountered multiple times in a feature vector, the value fed to the trainer will be the sum of values for all of the feature occurrences.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  LinearSVMModelTrainer.LinearSVMModelParameter
      A parameter accepted by the linear SVM model trainer.

      The Linear SVM solver algorithms.

        boolean isBalanceEventCounts()
        If one vs. rest is used, should we balance the event counts so that the current outcome events are approximately proportional to the other outcome events?
